wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Spofforth, born 1743 and died on 16 May 1826, was an English Organist.

link_mentions.page: Church of St Mary Magdalene, Newark-on-Trent
response: At the beginning of the 19th century a new organ, by George Pike England, with three manuals, was provided by the trustees of the Magnus, Brown's and Phyllypott's charities at a cost of £1,300. It was opened on 11 November 1804 by Thomas Spofforth.
